text: Megyn Marie Kelly (born November 18, 1970; previously called Megyn Kendall) is an American reporter on Fox News and NBC. She hosted The Kelly File. She previously hosted America Live on Fox News and Megyn Kelly Today on NBC. She also hosts the channel's New Year's Eve Special Live every December 31. ==Criticism== On October 26, 2018, NBC News announced the cancellation of Megyn Kelly Today in the wake of defending blackface as Halloween costumes. ==Personal life== Kelly was born in Syracuse, New York. She is a Roman Catholic. ==References== Category:Writers from Syracuse, New York Category:American journalists Category:1970 births Category:Living people
title: Megyn Kelly
